resources.string: How to use the Lunch Decider

1. For selection of desired food type, tap Select to activate menu. If no specific food
 type is desired, this step may be skipped and Any will be automatically selected.

 2. Tap radio button corresponding to the desired food type.

 3. Repeat steps 1 and 2 for restaurant type and maximum driving distance if desired.

 4. Tap Go, then wait for game to load.

 5. Tap screen to play Plinko game.

 6. After completion of Plinko game, winning restaurant information is displayed.

 7. If driving directions are needed, tap "Driving Directions". Or to run application again, tap Back.

 8. If driving direction were selected, Google turn by turn directions are loaded and displayed.

 9. To see a map of the travel route, tap the map icon in the upper left of the screen.

 If you have questions or suggestions

 please contact customer service

 Ravi Teja 

 Email ravirockz.tejagmail.com 

 Midwestern State University 

 Graduate student in Computer science
